statements: DELETE FROM website_visitors WHERE visitor_id = 10 AND referral_source = 'Google';
DELETE FROM website_visitors WHERE visit_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND visited_page LIKE '%home%';
DELETE FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 100 AND duration_seconds > 60;
DELETE FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 100 AND visitor_id = 2;
DELETE FROM ConversionEvents WHERE event_id = 100 AND conversion_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM VisitorActions WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND action_id = 50;
DELETE FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_ip = '192.168.0.1' AND page_visited = 'home';
